languages.text: "Слушаю я вас, Первый офицер Версериан, и задаюсь вопросом: а постель Леди Теодоры вы так же бдительно охраняли?"
"Listening to you now, First Officer Werserian, I wonder if you guarded Lady Theodora's bed as vigilantly as you do the current Lord Captain's."
languages.original_text: "Слушаю я вас, Первый офицер Версериан, и задаюсь вопросом: а постель Леди Теодоры вы так же бдительно охраняли?"

traits.locale_text: "Listening to you now, First Officer Werserian, I wonder if you guarded Lady Theodora's bed as vigilantly as you do the current Lord Captain's."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Listening to you now, First Officer Werserian, I wonder if you guarded Lady Theodora's bed as vigilantly as you do the current Lord Captain's."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Listening to you now, First Officer Werserian, I wonder if you guarded Lady Theodora's bed as vigilantly as you do the current Lord Captain's."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Listening to you now, First Officer Werserian, I wonder if you guarded Lady Theodora's bed as vigilantly as you do the current Lord Captain's."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “听听你自己说的是什么话，韦尔森大副。莫非你以前也是这样，时时刻刻紧盯着西奥多拉夫人的卧榻吗？”
languages.original_text: "Listening to you now, First Officer Werserian, I wonder if you guarded Lady Theodora's bed as vigilantly as you do the current Lord Captain's."

traits.locale_text: “听听你自己说的是什么话，韦尔森大副。莫非你以前也是这样，时时刻刻紧盯着西奥多拉夫人的卧榻吗？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « À vous entendre, second Werserian, l'on pourrait croire que vous gardiez le lit de dame Théodora avec autant de vigilance que celui {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: "Listening to you now, First Officer Werserian, I wonder if you guarded Lady Theodora's bed as vigilantly as you do the current Lord Captain's."

traits.locale_text: « À vous entendre, second Werserian, l'on pourrait croire que vous gardiez le lit de dame Théodora avec autant de vigilance que celui {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} aujourd'hui. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Al escucharle, primer oficial Werserian, tengo que preguntarme si protegía la cama de lady Theodora con tanto celo como la de nuestr{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán actual».
languages.original_text: "Listening to you now, First Officer Werserian, I wonder if you guarded Lady Theodora's bed as vigilantly as you do the current Lord Captain's."

traits.locale_text: «Al escucharle, primer oficial Werserian, tengo que preguntarme si protegía la cama de lady Theodora con tanto celo como la de nuestr{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán actual».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「今の話を聞いていると、ウェルザリアン一等航海士、あなたはレディ・シオドーラのベッドを、現ロード・キャプテンのベッドと同じように用心深く守っていたか疑問だな」
languages.original_text: "Listening to you now, First Officer Werserian, I wonder if you guarded Lady Theodora's bed as vigilantly as you do the current Lord Captain's."

traits.locale_text: 「今の話を聞いていると、ウェルザリアン一等航海士、あなたはレディ・シオドーラのベッドを、現ロード・キャプテンのベッドと同じように用心深く守っていたか疑問だな」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn ich Euch so reden höre, Erster Offizier Werserian, frage ich mich, ob Ihr Lady Theodoras Bett ebenso aufmerksam bewacht habt wie das des jetzigen Lord Captains."
languages.original_text: "Listening to you now, First Officer Werserian, I wonder if you guarded Lady Theodora's bed as vigilantly as you do the current Lord Captain's."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich Euch so reden höer, Erster Offizier Werserian, frage ich mich, ob Ihr Lady Theodoras Bett ebenso aufmerksam bewacht habt wie das des jetzigen Lord Captains."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Listening to you now, First Officer Werserian, I wonder if you guarded Lady Theodora's bed as vigilantly as you do the current Lord Captain's."

languages.text: "Şimdi konuşuyorsun ama İkinci Kaptan Werserian... Leydi Theodora'nın da böyle ahlak bekçiliğini yapıyor muydun acaba?"
languages.original_text: "Listening to you now, First Officer Werserian, I wonder if you guarded Lady Theodora's bed as vigilantly as you do the current Lord Captain's."

traits.locale_text: "Şimdi konuşuyorsun ama İkinci Kaptan Werserian... Leydi Theodora'nın da böyle ahlak bekçiliğini yapıyor muydun acaba?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
